licenseComments: Gnulib uses a variant wording of this exception.
licenseExceptionTemplate: As a special exception to the GNU General Public License, <<var;name="Gnulib-alternation-1";original="if you distribute this file";match="if\s+you\s+distribute\s+this\s+file|this\s+file\s+may\s+be\s+distributed">> as part of a program that contains a configuration script generated by Autoconf, <<var;name="Gnulib-alternation-2";original="you may include it under the same distribution terms that you use for";match="you\s+may\s+include\s+it\s+under\s+the\s+same\s+distribution\s+terms\s+that\s+you\s+use\s+for|under\s+the\s+same\s+distribution\s+terms\s+as">> the rest of that program.
exceptionTextHtml: As a special exception to the GNU General Public License, if you distribute this file as part of a program that contains a configuration script generated by Autoconf, you may include it under the same distribution terms that you use for the rest of that program.
